author: Shujin
name: Rainbow Dash
description:
Hello, this is my first theme for Cinnamon! Nothing special but pony! It's just a simple (Maybe too simple) theme based on Rainbow Dash.
Tested at the resolution of  1366 x 768.
For any problems or suggestions, this is my email adress: andreamilano@graphic- designer.com
